alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Henderson; Kaufman; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 10:29PM CDT until October 04 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kaufman County in north central Texas... Western Henderson County in central Texas... Northern Ellis County in north central Texas... Northeastern Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1028 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Palmer and Forreston, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Waxahachie, Ennis, Glenn Heights, Red Oak, Gun Barrel City, Mabank, Ferris, Malakoff, Tool, Palmer, Kerens, Seven Points, Oak Leaf, Kemp, Trinidad, Bardwell, Grays Prairie, Alma and Enchanted Oaks. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 391 and 411. Interstate 45 between mile markers 236 and 266. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
